title: Seal of Approval - Boomer Living
content:
Hi friend

Help me id these fonts used on the seal Seal of Boomer Living

Thanks in advance

hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121090632im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/BoomerSeal_copy_5995.jpg)

 [‹ les immatériaux](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121090632/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49855 "Go to previous forum topic") [Rich Girl Enterprise logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121090632/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49859 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: Seal of Approval makes use of [Cloister Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121090632/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/cloister-black/).

what about Boomer Living?

thanks

hernando
And the font going all around could be Garamond.
